skillTree.localised_description: Furtive, scheming, sly, cunning, underhand, devious, conniving, double-dealing, and sneaky - valuable traits if you wish to stay alive!
All Skaven are unprincipled and untrustworthy by their foul natures. However, this is rarely a disadvantage in the face of the enemy.
Make no mistake – in most cases, a Master Assassin’s training is quite literally a baptism of fire.
By its very nature, being good at killing requires that you are equally adept at not dying.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +15% chance of wounding aggressors

Enemy Hero action success chance: -15%
	(enemy characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: With the right encouragement, even the weakest of Skaven will fight undaunted... for a time.
The first moves of the battle tilt the way of Clan Eshin.
On the charge, some Skaven swing with such fury that their accuracy is decreased, but their damage increases massively
His time in Mordheim has given Fylch access to a great trove of Warpstone, and those Skaven who most desire it flock to his service.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -15% for Warpfire Thrower, Warp Lightning Cannon and Doomwheel units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: Years of digging through the ruins of the broken city has taught Fylch the importance of resisting the touch of wyrdstone, no matter how desirable it might be.
A vile substance distilled from warpstone, this foul concoction rots the flesh of anyone so unlucky to touch it.
So much of war is an art. Over time and with much practice, combat moves can resemble a series of perfectly-rehearsed dance moves.
This being fights dirty, no honour system applies here!
"Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"
Whether a targeted slice to the throat, or a precision stab to the heart, this one knows how to kill!
"The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud – these are the things that sustain me."
Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.
Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife in…
The harder they hit, the more they commit, the easier it is to strike back.
A drawn blade should not be put away until slaked in blood.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.description: Vanguard Deployment||This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

backgroundSkills.localised_name: Greatest killer in all Clan Eshin
backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Poxkeeper Bilebreath choke down on plague when Flych drops big rock on his tail! Not-never hear-learn about Flych? Best assassin is one nobody knows! Be proud-honour to work for Flych! Flych will let you find much-much wyrdstone for him! Great-great honour!"

effects.description:
Leadership: +8 during ambushes
	(all units in army)

Melee attack: +6 during ambushes
	(all units in army)
